short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NordLayer is an adaptive network access solution designed for modern businesses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NordLayer is a cloud-based adaptive network access solution that allows modern businesses to encrypt and securely access company resources. It combines the Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) principles to help businesses of all sizes to enhance their internet security.

NordLayer offers a variety of features, including:

- Virtual Private Gateways
- Dedicated servers with fixed IP
- ThreatBlock
- Custom DNS
- DNS filtering
- Encryption on a browser level
- Auto-connect
- Two-factor authentication (2FA)

All of these features allow businesses to securely control and segment access to their private networks, resources, and sensitive information.

NordLayer Browser Extension is a lightweight solution used to secure online connections when accessing web-based resources configured on the company’s virtual private gateways and secured on a browser level exclusively.

If you have any questions or concerns, contact our 24/7 Customer Support team at support@nordlayer.com.
long.lt:
NordLayer is a cloud-based adaptive network access solution that allows modern businesses to encrypt and securely access company resources. It combines the Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) and Secure Access Service Edge (SASE) principles to help businesses of all sizes to enhance their internet security.

NordLayer offers a variety of features, including:

- Virtual Private Gateways
- Dedicated servers with fixed IP
- ThreatBlock
- Custom DNS
- DNS filtering
- Encryption on a browser level
- Auto-connect
- Two-factor authentication (2FA)

All of these features allow businesses to securely control and segment access to their private networks, resources, and sensitive information.

NordLayer Browser Extension is a lightweight solution used to secure online connections when accessing web-based resources configured on the company’s virtual private gateways and secured on a browser level exclusively.

NordLayer Browser Extension is limited in functionality. If you want to experience NordLayer to the fullest, download the NordLayer app at https://nordlayer.com/download.

By installing NordLayer Browser Extension, you agree with NordLayer’s Terms of Services and Privacy Policy at https://nordlayer.com/terms-of-service and https://nordlayer.com/privacy-policy.

If you have any questions or concerns, contact our 24/7 Customer Support team at support@nordlayer.com. 

Alternatively, you can find more information on our website at https://nordlayer.com; or in the NordLayer Help Center at https://help.nordlayer.com.
